timeline.bodyText: @kevin-zhonghao Please check PM's new API for port count in a subnet, it should be {"/project/{project_id}/subnet-port-count/{subnet_id}. This api will only return non-gateway port count. If it's not zero, the subnet cannot be deleted. If it returns zero, we need to ask PM to delete the gateway port first before delete the subnet.
timeline.author: cj-chung

timeline.bodyText: @kevin-zhonghao please prepare a RouterUpdateInfo object here for request body. @chenpiaoping's code for this API requires RouterUpdateInfo object.
timeline.author: cj-chung
